channel.description: CC 410 - Week 7 Updates Deadlines moved to Monday Module 7 Released Module 8 On Deck Module 9 & 10 Finalizing Grading this week! This Week 3/15 - Parallel Programming 3/15 - Parallel Example 3/15 - Event-Driven Programming 3/15 - Event Driven Example 3/15 - Restaurant Milestone 5 Milestone 5 GUI Events Refine GUI Structure - Tree Add Button Click Handlers (Mostly) Functional GUI Some Unit Tests Read the Hints!
